item.title: Howard add a quote by Charles Portis
item.description: "I have known some horses and a good many more pigs who I believe harbored evil intent in their hearts. I will go further and say all cats are wicked, though often useful. Who has not seen Satan in their sly faces?" -- Charles Portis

item.title: Howard add a quote by Sandra Newman
item.description: "Examining the actual contents of my crying, I found a quailing sludge emotion, with a foul insecticide taste. If it was a peanut, you would spit it out. Yet I was indulging this toxic goo, giving it its head and letting it dictate my actions. People had every good reason to despise me. " -- Sandra Newman

item.title: Howard add a quote by Sandra Newman
item.description: "That sense of the world being the lack of something dogged him for years, and when it stopped dogging him, he felt unmoored. " -- Sandra Newman

item.title: Howard add a quote by Sandra Newman
Howard add a quote by Iain Banks
item.description: "You need to read more science fiction. Nobody who reads science fiction comes out with this crap about the end of history" -- Iain Banks
